content.prompt:
Listen to the excerpt.

The notation above is correct, but in the version you hear there is a voice-leading error. Which of the following statements accurately describes the error heard?

choices.label: The leading tone does not resolve up by step.
The chordal seventh of the seventh chord does not resolve down by step.
The inverted seventh chord is incomplete; the third is omitted.
The inverted seventh chord is incomplete; the fifth is omitted.
